text: Futhi lowo owamthengayo waseGibhithe wathi kumkakhe “yenze inhlalo yakhe ibe yinhle hleze abe usizo kuthina noma simthathe njengendodana futhi kanjalo-ke samzinzisa uJosefa emhlabeni ukuze simfundise ukuhunyuswa kwezigameko futhi uMvelinqangi unamandla phezu kodaba lwakhe kepha iningi labantu alazi.”
